title: Android 13 adds granular vibration sliders for notifications, media, phone calls & more
content:
Android 13 is on the horizon, and with each developer preview and beta, we’ll be getting a glimpse of what’s to come in the final version. We’ve seenÂ new PC features, the potential for scheduled dark mode, and a whole lot more, too. One other feature that Google has added in the latest developer preview is

The post Android 13 adds granular vibration sliders for notifications, media, phone calls & more appeared first on xda-developers.
description: Android 13 will add granular vibration sliders for notifications, media, phone calls, touch input, and more settings. Check them out here!
